message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth more than the market average. My initial offer is $14000 for the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $13000?
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to meet you halfway. My counteroffer is $13500 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $12500 for the product.
I appreciate your proposal, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your budget, I am willing to sell the product for $13000.
